text: Yeah they said I have 6 months until I recover. They gave me Oxycodine and Valium. I've been trying to slowly wean myself off. The first two week were excruciating so I needed them every 3-4 hours, but now I only take them every 8 hours and I'm manganing okayish with the pain now
